title: Cannot Evaluate Global Expressions Outside of Iteration Loop
description: When working with global expressions, like {params['p1']}, {new DateTime()}, they should be available and evaluatable within the BIRT scripting environment. Currently, Dte scriptExpression has three types: BEFOREFIRSTROW, AFTERLASTROW, ONEACHROW.
OB: Global expressions, such as {params['p1']}, {new DateTime()}, cannot be evaluated when ResultIterator is not in the iteration loop.
EB: Global expressions should return a correct result value whenever they are evaluated within the BIRT scripting environment. To achieve this, a new GLOBAL expression type is required to indicate this need.
SR:
To reproduce this issue:
1. Create a BIRT report.
2. Add global expressions like {params['p1']} or {new DateTime()} outside of any iteration loop.
3. Attempt to evaluate the report.
4. Observe that the global expressions do not return the expected values.
